content:
You need a password to login to your account on your email provider's server. Thunderbird is just passing on the password you type to the server.

What error message do you get?

Can you login to your account via webmail?
creator: christ1

content: Would you please post a screenshot of the screen asking for <your login>? That may help. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: Is your photo an attachment to a message you have received? In that case you can right-click the attachment at the bottom bar of the message window - Save As.
creator: christ1

content: Maybe if you post the complete error message, plus screenshots of incoming server setting and SMTP server settings, we may have suggestions. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: Yes, that should do it. Be sure thunderbird is not running during that copy.

content: You need t allow cookies in Thunderbird for the OAuth authentication process to work. https://support.mozilla.org/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20
